name: Give an Imp a Chance!
detailed_description:
Give an imp a chance is a new visual novel about Suzuki, a frustrated salaryman, who has delved into the occult. After weeks of preparation, he is finally ready to summon a succubus. However, he botches the ritual and summons an imp by mistake. Despite his initial disappointment, the imp begs him to give her a chance. Later, he summons her again and finds that she has changed since he last saw her...

GAIAC has multiple hentai scenes and several startling transformations, along with a light hearted story about demon summoning and how dramatically life can change when you meet the right person.

Credits
Character art by DaiwaDaicon (sleeeepers_high)
Backgrounds by AvareonArt
OST by Fabled Ways
GUI by Kathaeris
Project management and writing by Liberty
Trailer by Badriel

short_description: Suzuki, a frustrated salaryman, attempts to summon a succubus in this visual novel, but summons an imp by mistake. She begs him to give her a chance and he reluctantly agrees. Sometime later, he summons her again, only to find that she has changed since they last met.
